original_text: But I trust I shall shortly see thee, and we shall speak face to face. Peace be to thee. Our friends salute thee. Greet the friends by name.
korean_text: 속히 보기를 바라노니 또한 우리가 대면하여 말하리라

sentences.original_text: But I trust I shall shortly see thee
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 곧 당신을 뵐 수 있을 것이라고 믿습니다

sentences.original_text: and we shall speak face to face
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 얼굴을 맞대고 이야기할 것입니다
